ExpirationDays.Name: ExpirationDays
ExpirationDays.Text: number of days until files expire

FilesAreDeleted.Name: FilesAreDeleted
FilesAreDeleted.Condition: (ExpirationDays = 1 and AgeOfFiles = LessThan1) or (ExpirationDays = 2 and AgeOfFiles = MoreThan2)

FilesAreNotDeleted.Name: FilesAreNotDeleted
FilesAreNotDeleted.Condition: (ExpirationDays = 1 and AgeOfFiles = LessThan1) or (ExpirationDays = 2 and AgeOfFiles != MoreThan2)
